LanguageData.SFS_DefaultPetPolicy.label: Animals
LanguageData.SFS_DefaultPetPolicy.description: Will prefer food for animals. Hunt > Grass > Human corpses > hay > kibble..\nBut will allow other foods if those are not available.
LanguageData.SFS_PetPolicy_NoHunt.label: No hunt
LanguageData.SFS_PetPolicy_Limited.label: Food4animals only
LanguageData.SFS_PetPolicy_Limited.description: Only foods for animal: Grass, hay, kibble, raw human meat/corpse.\nBut also simple and nutrient paste meals (they are more cost efficient than kibble!).
LanguageData.SFS_DefaultPetPolicy_AllowTrees.label: Allow trees
LanguageData.SFS_DefaultPetPolicy_AllowTrees.descript: Same as "animals" but allows trees. Useful for thrumbos
